atk-ploy-1.description: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-3 until the end of foe's next action.
atk-ploy-1.name: Atk Ploy 1

atk-ploy-2.description: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-4 until the end of foe's next action.
atk-ploy-2.name: Atk Ploy 2

atk-ploy-3.description: At start of turn, all foes in cardinal directions with Res 1 or more lower than unit suffer Atk-5 until the end of foe's next action.
atk-ploy-3.name: Atk Ploy 3

atk-smoke-1.description: After combat, inflicts Atk-3 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
atk-smoke-1.name: Atk Smoke 1

atk-smoke-2.description: After combat, inflicts Atk-5 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
atk-smoke-2.name: Atk Smoke 2

atk-smoke-3.description: After combat, inflicts Atk-7 on foes within 2 spaces of target through their next actions.
atk-smoke-3.name: Atk Smoke 3

brash-assault-1.description: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack when at HP ≤ 30% and attacking a foe that can counter.
brash-assault-1.name: Brash Assault 1

brash-assault-2.description: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack when at HP ≤ 40% and attacking a foe that can counter.
brash-assault-2.name: Brash Assault 2

brash-assault-3.description: Unit automatically makes a follow-up attack when at HP ≤ 50% and attacking a foe that can counter.
brash-assault-3.name: Brash Assault 3

breath-of-life-1.description: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 3 HP after combat.
breath-of-life-1.name: Breath of Life 1

breath-of-life-2.description: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 5 HP after combat.
breath-of-life-2.name: Breath of Life 2

breath-of-life-3.description: If unit initiates attack, adjacent allies recover 7 HP after combat.
breath-of-life-3.name: Breath of Life 3

close-def-1.description: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+2 during combat.
close-def-1.name: Close Def 1

close-def-2.description: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+4 during combat.
close-def-2.name: Close Def 2

close-def-3.description: If unit is attacked by foe using sword, axe, lance, or dragonstone, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.
close-def-3.name: Close Def 3

deflect-magic-1.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.
deflect-magic-1.name: Deflect Magic 1

deflect-magic-2.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.
deflect-magic-2.name: Deflect Magic 2

deflect-magic-3.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using magic, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.
deflect-magic-3.name: Deflect Magic 3

deflect-melee-1.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.
deflect-melee-1.name: Deflect Melee 1

deflect-melee-2.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.
deflect-melee-2.name: Deflect Melee 2

deflect-melee-3.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a sword, lance, or axe, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.
deflect-melee-3.name: Deflect Melee 3

deflect-missile-1.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 30%.
deflect-missile-1.name: Deflect Missile 1

deflect-missile-2.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 50%.
deflect-missile-2.name: Deflect Missile 2

deflect-missile-3.description: If unit receives consecutive attacks from a foe using a bow or dagger, damage from second attack onward reduced by 80%.
deflect-missile-3.name: Deflect Missile 3

distant-def-1.description: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+2 during combat.
distant-def-1.name: Distant Def 1

distant-def-2.description: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+4 during combat.
distant-def-2.name: Distant Def 2

distant-def-3.description: If unit is attacked by foe using bow, daggers, magic, or staff, unit receives Def/Res+6 during combat.
distant-def-3.name: Distant Def 3

fortify-def-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-def-1.name: Fortify Def 1

fortify-def-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-def-2.name: Fortify Def 2

fortify-def-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-def-3.name: Fortify Def 3

fortify-res-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-res-1.name: Fortify Res 1

fortify-res-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-res-2.name: Fortify Res 2

fortify-res-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
fortify-res-3.name: Fortify Res 3

guidance-1.description: If unit has 100% HP, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.
guidance-1.name: Guidance 1

guidance-2.description: If unit has ≥50% HP, infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.
guidance-2.name: Guidance 2

guidance-3.description: Infantry and armored allies within 2 spaces can move to a space adjacent to unit.
guidance-3.name: Guidance 3

heavy-blade-1.description:
If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 5, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)
heavy-blade-1.name: Heavy Blade 1

heavy-blade-2.description:
If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 3, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)
heavy-blade-2.name: Heavy Blade 2

heavy-blade-3.description:
If unit's Atk - foe's Atk ≥ 1, unit gains Special cooldown charge +1 per attack.
(If using other similar skill, only highest value applied.)
heavy-blade-3.name: Heavy Blade 3

hone-spd-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
hone-spd-1.name: Hone Spd 1

hone-spd-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
hone-spd-2.name: Hone Spd 2

hone-spd-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 through their next actions at the start of each turn.
hone-spd-3.name: Hone Spd 3

panic-ploy-1.description: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 5 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.
panic-ploy-1.name: Panic Ploy 1

panic-ploy-2.description: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 3 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.
panic-ploy-2.name: Panic Ploy 2

panic-ploy-3.description: At start of turn, bonuses become penalties on all foes in cardinal directions with HP 1 or more lower than unit through foe's next action.
panic-ploy-3.name: Panic Ploy 3

phantom-spd-1.description: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +5 over actual value.
phantom-spd-1.name: Phantom Spd 1

phantom-spd-2.description: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +8 over actual value.
phantom-spd-2.name: Phantom Spd 2

phantom-spd-3.description: When any skill compares this unit's Spd stat to another unit's, this unit's Spd stat is counted as +10 over actual value.
phantom-spd-3.name: Phantom Spd 3

quickened-pulse.description: Special cooldown count -1 at start of Turn 1.
quickened-pulse.name: Quickened Pulse

savage-blow-1.description: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 3 damage after combat.
savage-blow-1.name: Savage Blow 1

savage-blow-2.description: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 5 damage after combat.
savage-blow-2.name: Savage Blow 2

savage-blow-3.description: If unit initiates attack, foes within 2 spaces of target take 7 damage after combat.
savage-blow-3.name: Savage Blow 3

spur-atk-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+2 during combat.
spur-atk-1.name: Spur Atk 1

spur-atk-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+3 during combat.
spur-atk-2.name: Spur Atk 2

spur-atk-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Atk+4 during combat.
spur-atk-3.name: Spur Atk 3

spur-def-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+2 during combat.
spur-def-1.name: Spur Def 1

spur-def-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+3 during combat.
spur-def-2.name: Spur Def 2

spur-def-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Def+4 during combat.
spur-def-3.name: Spur Def 3

spur-res-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+2 during combat.
spur-res-1.name: Spur Res 1

spur-res-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+3 during combat.
spur-res-2.name: Spur Res 2

spur-res-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Res+4 during combat.
spur-res-3.name: Spur Res 3

spur-spd-1.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+2 during combat.
spur-spd-1.name: Spur Spd 1

spur-spd-2.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+3 during combat.
spur-spd-2.name: Spur Spd 2

spur-spd-3.description: Grants adjacent allies Spd+4 during combat.
spur-spd-3.name: Spur Spd 3

threaten-spd-1.description: Inflicts Spd-3 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.
threaten-spd-1.name: Threaten Spd 1

threaten-spd-2.description: Inflicts Spd-4 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.
threaten-spd-2.name: Threaten Spd 2

threaten-spd-3.description: Inflicts Spd-5 on foes within 2 spaces through their next actions at the start of each turn.
threaten-spd-3.name: Threaten Spd 3
